other_tests.findings: Sinus tachycardia and left ventricular high voltage.
Peripheral neurogenic damage of upper and lower extremities with myogenic damage.
Pathological changes in mitochondrial inherited disorders (MIDs) and neuronal damage.
Heteroplasmic m3271 T>C mutation in the mitochondrial tRNA-Leu gene (UUR), with the proportion of mutant mtDNA reaching 87.4%.
